title: Ferrari Challenge Series Joins Wakefield 300 Weekend
author: Emma Thompson
excerpt: The prestigious Ferrari Challenge series will be joining the Wakefield 300 weekend as a support category, bringing world-class single-make racing to the event.
body: The prestigious Ferrari Challenge series has been confirmed as a major support category for the Wakefield 300 weekend, bringing world-class single-make racing to complement the main endurance event. This marks the first time the Ferrari Challenge has visited Wakefield Park.

The addition of the Ferrari Challenge series significantly elevates the profile of the event weekend, with over 20 Ferrari 488 Challenge Evo cars expected to participate across multiple race categories including Trofeo Pirelli and Coppa Shell divisions.

"Having the Ferrari Challenge join our event is a tremendous honor," said Event Director Amanda Foster. "The combination of our endurance racing with the precision and spectacle of single-make Ferrari racing will create an unforgettable weekend for motorsport fans."

The Ferrari drivers will compete in two races over the weekend, with qualifying sessions and practice runs adding to the on-track action. The distinctive sound and sight of the Ferrari Challenge cars is expected to draw significant additional spectator interest.

This partnership represents a growing relationship between the Wakefield 300 organizers and premium motorsport categories, with discussions already underway for future collaborations with other prestigious racing series.
